Field2: As an industry we have to stop this promise of empowerment.  Over promise of life achievement and find another insight. It’s lazy. Samsung do it, cereals do it, deodorant do it, energy drinks do it –  really, the list goes on. It’s like watching a corporate feel good video. Just empty of any idea.
How is this any different to putting a woman in white jeans on a white horse? It isn’t.
Best thing out of Ogilvy since Chris Ford did name on a can.

Name on a can was Alex and Jacob.
Everyone else is a coat tailing imposter.
